description:
Yuuto Amakawa is a normal high schooler with nothing special going on in his life. But when a strange girl visits him on his sixteenth birthday, everything takes a turn for the bizarre. Yuuto’s in for a whirlwind of demons, cat girls, and magic galore!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Cat, a Girl, and Allergies
El Gato, La Chica y La Alergia
猫と少女とアレルギー
